idea:
Urvyam is a Low Cost Satellite Launch Service provider to private and government Satellite
manufacturers.

Urvyam design, develop and build its own unique and innovative Patent Pending Urvyam Engines  and Rockets for the purpose of launching all types of Satellite/s into required Orbit/s. 

An Urvyam Engine is capable of producing high thrust to a rocket that can Lift a heavy payload or  Satellite anywhere between 1000 Kg to 10,000 Kg to Geo-synchronous Transfer Orbit (GTO) or an  altitude of 35,786 KM in highly reliable yet at a very Low Cost.
name: URVYAM ENGINES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Founded in late 2014 and bootstrapped still, Luxepolis is today recognised as a game changer in the Indian luxury industry and playing a significant role in shaping the future of India's upscale lifestyle goods industry. 

Luxepolis is trusted by millions of high spenders in India and Luxepolis clocks one of the highest average sales per orders in the world. Alexa consistently ranks Luxepolis at the top of the traffic charts amongst all upscale online platforms in India. 

Luxepolis provides our customers a wide selection of authentic upscale products exceeding 47,000 new & certified pre-owned branded products, covering over 500 Indian and global luxury brands like Rolex, Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Dior, Chanel, Omega, Patek Philippe, Audemars Piguet, Michael Kors, Coach, Sabyasachi etc - the largest platform in India in its category. 

Brand New products are sourced from Luxepolis's trusted global sourcing and supply chain network of leading luxury fashion boutiques across the world. 

Supported by Luxepolis proprietary database of upscale branded products, our authentication procedures and 200+ person years of experience global authentication team, we are able to ensure the authenticity and quality of every product offered on our platform. Luxepolis is the only company that provides Authenticity Certificate since the inception and has 100% track record of shipping only authentic products. 

We also partnered with major NBFCs and almost all major bank credit card companies to extend 5 year tenure EMIs on our product purchases. Luxepolis is also at the forefront of business innovation by launching 'Buy-Back Assurance' and 'Insurance' policies on the (select) designer handbags, accessories, jewellery and luxury watches.

 

Luxepolis partnered with critical shipment logistic companies to ensure our customers experience the best of our products and services and boasts of 0% leakage or pilferage till date.

Luxepolis founder, Mr. Vijay KG, has been named as Indian luxury's top-100 most influential by Blackbook. Luxepolis is proud to have been the only online luxury business featured in top-100 list.
name: LUXEPOLIS RETAIL SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

The future of electronics manufacturing is shifting from American and European monopoly to Asian brands. We have to be prepared to incorporate Asian brands on our PCB's to be more affordable and commercially viable.

idea:
Sustainable Approach for Green Environment (SAGE) is an idea conceived from the Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay. A multidisciplinary consultancy with a young & passionate team, SAGE help company manage their environmental sustainability needs. Right from state of the art research & development facilities, use of environmental modelling system tools to conducting environmental health and safety risk analysis, SAGE offers a wide range of consultancy services to various companies. The SAGE group is being mentored by the professors from IIT Bombay.
The core values of innovation and environment conservation drives the team to deliver sustainable solutions to its clients. SAGE is supported by an experienced and dedicated group of advisers with a strong professional background in Environmental Auditing, Monitoring, Water and Wastewater Treatment, Air Pollution Control, Solid & Hazardous Waste Management and Corporate Sustainability Reporting.
With a goal of embarking towards sustainable and equitable growth, we work with regulatory agencies, research institutions, consultants, conservationists, NGO’s and everyone passionate about environmental stewardship. We boast of being associated with a wide range of clientele and also of creating a lasting impression at an early stage in the market.
name: SUSTAINABLE APPROACH FOR GREEN ENVIRONMENT PRIVATE LIMITED
